ekuqaleni unkulunkulu wadala izulu nomhlaba
umhlaba wawuyihlane elingenalutho kwakungubumnyama phezu kotwa kepha umoya kankulunkulu wehla wenyuka phezu kwamanzi
unkulunkulu wathi makube khona ukukhanya kwaba khona ukukhanya
unkulunkulu wabona ukukhanya ukuthi kuhle unkulunkulu wahlukanisa ukukhanya nobumnyama
unkulunkulu wabiza ukukhanya ngokuthi imini ubumnyama wabubiza ngokuthi ubusuku kwaba ngukuhlwa kwaba ngukusa usuku lokuqala
indlela ongawuqinisa ngayo umshado wakho
bona ngeso lengqondo indlu esiwohlokile
upende uyaxebuka  uphahla lonakele  ngisho negceke lenile
kusobala ukuthi lesi sakhiwo kade sasibhekana neziphepho ezinzima futhi besinganakekelwa
ingabe kufanele sibhidlizwe
funda umhlahlandlela wesicelo sokujoyina ekhasini  ngokucophelela njengoba uqukethe ulwazi olubalulekile oluzokusiza ekugcwaliseni ifomu lokufaka isicelo sokujoyina ngendlela efanele
gcwalisa ifomu lesicelo sokujoyina ngemuva bese uqinisekisa ukuthi uwafake onke amaphepha adingekayo kanye nesisayindo sakho lapho kudingeka khona
ngemininingwane ethe xaxa
zokwamukela isicelo sakho
isicelo sakho sizobambezeleka uma ungamhlinzeki ugems ngawo wonke amaphepha adingekayo
kodwa uma kungabantu abaningi abaphatheka ngendlela ebuhlungu cishe kungakhohlakaleki mpelampela
kwakunjalo nakunkosazana
abantu babengamkhohlwa ngisho nanamhla lokhu
ngisho nezingane zazikhula zixoxelwa ngaye
wayesejike waba yinganekwane yendawo
